subject: Re: [junit] Junit question
msgSnippet: ... JUnit is a testing framework, not a debugger. That said, it is possible to run tests against already written and compiled Java programs, even if you don t
messageBody:
On 9/21/06, san_patt <san_patt@...> wrote:
> Is it possible to debug already written java program in JUnit.

JUnit is a testing framework, not a debugger. That said, it is
possible to run tests against already written and compiled Java
programs, even if you don't have the source code for them.

Simon

--
